Articles.Content: Yeehay! Post your escape attempt (or proof of why the above's escape attempt failed) and post your attempt to kill the next one!

Moved to Games. 

Customarily, the one starting the game posts the first move?

Your lack of a first move causes me to escape undetected!

I fire an airburst arrow at \_\_\_\_\_\_\_, and all I can say it good luck dodging it!

Sorry, but I happen to not be in its path.

It creates a portal that pulls the next poster on to the surface of Eve and closes a second after they wake up after being knocked out by the force of hitting Eve.

I open a portal to my personal portable dimension, duh.

I freeze time everywhere except for my portable dimension to prevent any escapees.
I start my own personal dimension that follows my rules of time, and send a space laser through the universe, except for my personal dimension.

You never said it was strong. I can stop this thing with my bare hands!

I unleash an Exahelix ripple in every direction as retaliation.
Watch it xan! Activates layered quantum shield which deflects the blast with a,much higher, concentrated strength to try and kill the next person.

Well, have you heard of a force field?

I teleport the next poster to the center of the Sun.
But i had a super advanced armor on that absorbs energy, and then devour the sun and unleash all of its power at the next person!
I point out the other thread, and jump to that. I then have the mods lock this thread and post a link to the other one.

The fact that I can still post here means you failed.

I go with the good ol' airburst arrows, being sure to line up a precise shot at the next person.

Pyro airblast time!

Airblasts arrow at next person.
*Air*-blasts do not reach far enough down... I am in a submarine currently 50m under the surface. Firing an armed ICBM at the next one.
Well luck all I have the nuclear football to disarm the icbm but I don't I just redirect ct it to the next poste
Nope the iron dome covers my escape, but good luck to the next one that has to survive a rolling thunder bombing campaign.
Haha! I hide in Albania, and instantly survive due to the massive bunkerism! I then mobilize the whole Albanian population as cyborgs and charge them at my enemy!
I go to America and have a mini Death Star fire at my enemy.

Eh, it's a laser, and a mini one at that. MIRROR!

Because it is a *Death Star* superlaser, though, I aim the reflected beam at the next poor sod I see.

I explain the physics on why such a weapon cannot exist.

I hand the paper to the next person as homework.
I burn the homework, and expel hot plasma through the universe.

I burn the homework, and use its energy to destroy all ideas of homework.

I press the big red "ERASE HISTORY" button, causing nothing to exist.
You just got ninja'ed.

I'm nothing. Therefore I exist. Plus: I'm fireproof (I ate a firebeetle corpse on dungeon level I5) <- Hot Plasma? Mwhahahahha \*munch-on-beetle\*

I poison the space bar of the next poster with E605 (skin contact alone will kill you).

**Edited <time datetime="2015-08-04T11:41:55Z" title="08/04/2015 11:41  AM" data-short="8 yr">August 4, 2015</time> by heng**

Iremoveitfromthespacebar and cover the next person with it.

- - - Updated - - -

Also heng, you had to reply to my post at the top.
